name: Magical Changes
description:
Press the arrows to change the images! 

See something you love? Click the half of the image you want to see to match the opposing half! 

This project was a collaboration between a number of artists, each tasked with creating one full image that could be mixed and matched with the others! 

Programming: @rsvpasap1

Art : @rsvpasap1, @DubniumGames, @PixelShorts, @jtapstv, @windfallapples, @Zugai89, @LouBagelCombo5, @pigeonhat, @Blawnode

Music: Locomule (opengameart.org)

**If you'd like to get involved too, hit me up on twitter!**

This project was inspired by Graham Oakley's Magical Changes
